doc.field: All relates to fire prevention inspection forms, specifically in context of a 2005 revision of the checklist and guide in response to the 2003 death of a firefighter (Spadafora was on revision project team). Documents include folders of old forms and related procedures; folder of new forms; related roll-out info: several copies of 2005 AFID Building inspection training instructor's manual, several copies of the final (and draft) Inspection Forms Reference Manual; VHS video: "Fire Prevention Inspection Form Redesign Project" running 6:26; 2 DVDs of an Introduction to the new AFID Inspection Forms and Reference Book (July 2005); many floppies of Powerpoint slides and apparently copies of drafts and final of the forms and reference manual. (Includes digital formats, video)
